amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Interior to submit recommendations to Congress on incorporating Internet-based lease sales for the sale of Federal oil and gas in certain circumstances.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3237 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3237 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2146) To require the Secretary of the Interior to submit recommendations to Congress on incorporating Internet-based lease sales for the sale of Federal oil and gas in certain circumstances.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3237 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3237 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2953.
